problem.markdown: 2. Which of the following statement is NOT TRUE for a CMOS inverter? ( ) Highest output level will be Vdd ( ) Lowest output level will be ground ( ) The output impedance will be low (x) The output will be very sensitive to noise and disturbances
problem.p: 2. Which of the following statement is NOT TRUE for a CMOS inverter?

choicegroup.choice: Highest output level will be Vdd
Lowest output level will be ground
The output impedance will be low
The output will be very sensitive to noise and disturbances
